info.name: LeftSideStar Bookmark Star Styled & Fixes - Fx 14+
info.description:
For Firefox 14+ and latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds. 

This style fixes some appearance compatibility problems and fixes some known bugs on Firefox 6+ or newer for "LeftSideStar 1.3.1 " extension: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/leftsidestar/ , since the new Urlbar Identity block design landed due to Bug 634065.

If you want to use [Ext] LeftSideStar and have the Identity Box look more similar to Firefox 5 use:
style 49786

Tested on Firefox 14+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora and Nightly builds.

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
info.additionalInfo:
Updated 03-08-2013
Now only compatible with Firefox 14+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora and Nightly builds. 

Updated 07-16-2012
Fixed an compatibility issue with Fx 14+ and newer builds when using the latest [Ext]Status-4-Evar Version 2012.07.08.17.

Updated 03-29-2012
Introduced new styling to the [Ext] LeftSideStar Bookmark Star and the Urlbar Notification Icons.
